coded_answer.p: My name is Steven. I'amI amI was very serpridesurprised when I getgot the letter from you. And and heard that I have winwon the priseprize. GogingGoingTo go to go on a camp in California in the U.S.A. for one week.

And the most important reason is because I'I am still a student. And I study at London International School. So July is my end of year holiday. So I would be happy to go onin julyJuly.
